services

Class UserProfileService

  • java.lang.Object
    • services.UserProfileService

  • public class UserProfileService
extends java.lang.Object
    Implements the functionality to fetch user profile info and user's last ten tweets using Twitter API.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      Creates this service

    • Method Detail

        public void setBaseUrl(java.lang.String url)
        Sets base URL for Twitter API
        Parameters:

      • userProfle

        public java.util.concurrent.CompletionStage<UserProfileAndTweets> userProfle(java.lang.String userName)
        Retrieves user profile info and last ten tweets for a given userName. First, the service retrieves a token for Twitter API. Then it gets user's profile info and user's ten last tweets and constructs a model object with the two and returns it as output. All this operations are done asynchronously.
        Parameters:
        userName - Twitter User ID
        Returns:
        a promise of UserProfileAndTweets which is the model that combines user profile info and user's ten last tweets
